reference.shortdesc: The property element represents a single property of the current topic's subject. For example, if the current reference topic describes a programming class, the property might show that the class is protected rather than public.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The property element generally appears together with a series of other properties; it contains three optional elements to provide a type, value, or description of the property.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The property element is specialized from the strow element in the topic module.
